backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing file/folder storage with blob management, access control with admin/user/guest roles, user approval workflow, profile management, and operations like upload, download, move, delete, search, and storage statistics.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: file type display improvements, Upload Files button repositioning with yellow border styling, breadcrumb navigation blue color restoration, and app version update to v0.4.127.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App.tsx with authentication and access control, FileList.tsx with file management and navigation, various UI components, and hooks for backend queries.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component orchestrating authentication via Internet Identity, access control bootstrap, conditional rendering of pending approval/profile setup/file management screens, folder navigation state, and automatic frontend canister ID population.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Pending approval screen component displaying a clock icon, user's Principal ID with copy functionality, and instructions to contact an administrator for access.
Empty file placeholder for admin management component functionality.
frontend/src/components/FileGallery.tsx: Grid-based file and folder gallery component with thumbnail display, selection checkboxes, action dropdowns for download/copy/move/delete, search result path navigation, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Main file browser component that displays folder contents with list/grid views, supports file upload/download, drag-and-drop, search, sorting, multi-select operations, folder navigation with breadcrumbs, and file preview modals.
frontend/src/components/FileListHeaderRo: Table header component for file list view with sortable columns (name, type, created, size), select-all checkbox, and optional location column for search results.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal dialog for previewing files (images, videos, audio, documents, text) with navigation between files, fullscreen/maximize modes, zoom/pan for images, and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer displaying copyright, version number, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with app branding, authentication controls (Internet Identity login/logout), user profile display with copyable principal ID, theme toggle, and admin management panel access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin panel dialog for managing system members (add/remove users with roles), displaying storage statistics, showing app version, and preventing deletion of the first admin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: First-time user onboarding form for creating a profile with username validation, real-time uniqueness checking with debouncing, and error handling for duplicate usernames.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes, displaying animated Sun and Moon icons from lucide-react.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanViewer.ts: A container component that enables zoom (via mouse wheel) and pan (via click-and-drag) interactions for its children, with automatic reset when children change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: A hook that automatically calls initializeAccessControl() once per authenticated session and invalidates access-related React Query caches after bootstrap completes, using sessionStorage to prevent duplicate calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing identity state and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
A hook that manages per-folder view mode (list or gallery) in memory for the current session, with each folder defaulting to 'list' view.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including user roles, file/folder management, search, admin functions, and storage stats, with access control checks and normalized search filtering.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string (0.4.127).
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Utility functions that retrieve backend and frontend canister IDs from multiple sources (environment variables, URL parameters, hostname, dfx-generated files) with fallback logic.
frontend/src/lib/dragDropDirectory.ts: Handles drag-and-drop file and directory extraction using the FileSystem API, recursively traversing directories to collect files with their relative paths.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Provides utilities for generating direct download URLs, copying file links to clipboard, and downloading files with correct filenames using blob URLs.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Provides file type detection, MIME type mapping, extension extraction, and human-readable type labels for various file categories (images, videos, documents, code, etc.).
frontend/src/lib/fileTypeTints.ts: Maps file categories and folders to theme-aware CSS tint classes for visual differentiation in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/folderNavigation.ts: Handles folder path resolution, breadcrumb generation, and navigation logic for traversing the folder hierarchy.
frontend/src/lib/folderUpload.ts: Manages recursive folder uploads by creating folder structures first, then uploading non-empty files with progress tracking and empty file filtering.
frontend/src/lib/formatFileSize.ts: Formats file sizes from bytes (number or bigint) into human-readable strings using base-1024 units (B, KB, MB, GB, TB).
frontend/src/lib/formatTime.ts: Converts backend Time values (bigint nanoseconds) into human-readable date/time strings with multiple formatting options (full, date-only, compact).
frontend/src/lib/id.ts: Generates cryptographically secure 32-byte random IDs as hex strings for file and folder identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Provides Unicode-aware, case-insensitive, diacritics-insensitive text normalization for search functionality.
frontend/src/lib/sortFileSystemItems.ts: Exports a function to sort file system items by name, size, type, created, or updated date with deterministic tie-breakers (kind, name, id) for stable ordering.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Builds a set of folder IDs representing a subtree by creating a parent-to-children index and recursively traversing descendants from a given start folder.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens (using oklch), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking four completed features: file type display improvements, upload button repositioning/styling, breadcrumb color restoration, and version bump to v0.4.127.
